alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 2:34PM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Winds will decrease some overnight before increasing again during the day Tuesday. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains and Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes I-80 from the Nevada border to the Tooele valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
